definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Nether cysteine nor ranitidine appaared to influence the stability of carnitine.
sentences.chinese: 半胱氨酸和雷尼替丁都不影響卡尼汀的穩定性。

sentences.english: It also lowers blood levels of homocysteine.
sentences.chinese: 它還可以降低高半胱氨酸中的血壓。

sentences.english: The inhibition could not be reversed by dilution but could be abolished by DTT.
sentences.chinese: 半胱氨酸對這種抑制作用呈雙功能效應。

sentences.english: Both in HD and PD patients, serum homocysteine had no significant correlation with lipid.
sentences.chinese: 兩者的血清同型半胱氨酸與血脂均不存在相關關係。

sentences.english: Tripeptide aldehyde. Reversible competitive inhibitor of serine and cysteine proteases.
sentences.chinese: 絲氨酸和半胱氨酸蛋白酶可逆的抑制劑。

sentences.english: The Association between Homocysteine and Ischemic Stroke;
sentences.chinese: 它還可以降低高半胱氨酸中的血壓。

sentences.english: The Hcy level was inversely related to concentration of folate.
sentences.chinese: 同型半胱氨酸水平隨葉酸濃度的增加而下降。

sentences.english: High levels of homocysteine have been linked to a greater risk of Alzheimer's.
sentences.chinese: 高濃度的高半胱氨酸會導致患老年癡呆症的風險增加。

sentences.english: BME is added to prevent oxidation of cysteines and to break up disulfide bonds.
sentences.chinese: BME的作用爲阻止半胱氨酸氧化和打開二硫鍵。

sentences.english: L-cysteine is also a reducing agent.
sentences.chinese: 半胱氨酸也是一種還原劑。

sentences.english: High homocysteine levels have been linked to heart attacks and strokes.
sentences.chinese: 高半胱氨酸中的血壓過高可以導致心臟病和中風。

sentences.english: Cysteine is the crucial limiting amino acid for intracellular gsh synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 半胱氨酸是細胞內合成谷胱甘肽的關鍵性氨基酸。

sentences.english: Resistin, a plasma protein, belongs to a family of cysteine-rich secretory proteins.
sentences.chinese: 抵抗素是存在於血漿中的富含半胱氨酸的分泌性蛋白。

sentences.english: In two groups, the blood fat and homocysteine level were measured.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象均行同型半胱氨酸及血脂檢測。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
